name: Talented (itch)
description:
Talented is a streamlined shoot-em-up with randomly generated talent trees. It was originally made as a gamejam project over the Easter Weekend in 2021 and it has continued to grow since!

- Use WASD/Arrow Keys to shoot
- Use 1/2/3/4 to use abilities
- Click on talents to purchase them

You will have different enemies, abilities and a new talent tree every run, so pay attention to each enemy's weaknesses and experiment with different builds.

Good Luck!
